entry.title: Remondis Master-Award for MALEO staff member Oliver Preuß

link.title: Remondis Master-Award for MALEO staff member Oliver Preuß

entry.content: We are proud to announce that our group member Oliver Preuß was awarded the REMONDIS-AlumniUM-Master-Award for his excellent performance in his Master studies (see official news on LinkedIn). Congratulations!!!
entry.summary: We are proud to announce that our group member Oliver Preuß was awarded the REMONDIS-AlumniUM-Master-Award for his excellent performance in his Master studies (see official news on LinkedIn). Congratulations!!!

entry.title: MALEO research website released
entry.content:
Finally, our new MALEO research website is online! The webpages contain information on our group research, our individual research profiles alongside pointers to external resources.

Things have been going pretty fine so far! One can say that we had a very good start at Paderborn University.

MALEO is growing! Dr. Britta Grimme joined us as a PostDoc in early December. Urban Skorc will join MALEO in January as a PhD student alongside two student assistants, Harshit Purohit and Soumitri Mukherjee, who will support us in our scientific endeavours.
entry.summary: Finally, our new MALEO research website is online! The webpages contain information on our group research, our individual research profiles alongside pointers to external resources.
